channel.title: Posts on Ethan Sertic's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ethan Sertic's Github Site

item.title: Who is the worst team to win a national title in college basketball since the NCAA introduced the 3-point line for the 1986-87 season?
item.description: It’s one of the best sporting events every year. The NCAA Tournament and March Madness is amazing for many sports fans. New moments, iconic games, and legacies are created every year during March Madness. There have been many different schools to win a national title in college basketball and every school has the chance to be a champion. The die-hard college basketball fans and media always like to compare who is the greatest college basketball national champion ever.

item.title: Bad Football Fix Result Column
item.description: I am going to write a blog post about the text cleaning assignment that I just finished. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() badfootball <- read_csv("badfootballlogs19.
